title: Spiritual Dryness
verses: Psalm 63:1 (WEB) — “My soul thirsts for you… in a dry and weary land.”
Psalm 42:1–2 (WEB) — “As the deer pants for streams… my soul pants for you.”
John 7:37–38 (WEB) — “If anyone is thirsty… rivers of living water.”
Hosea 6:3 (WEB) — “He will come… like the rain.”
body: Dry seasons invite honest hunger. Return to simple practices—Word, prayer, worship, and community. Ask the Spirit to refresh and restore you.
prayer: Living God, awaken my heart. Pour Your living water into my dryness and renew my first love. Amen.
